basicInformation.name: Yekkanti Venkatesh
basicInformation.d: Having 4+ years of experience in training students in engineering colleges throughout Andhra Pradesh on various technologies. Trained approximately 5000 students so far in short term & long term training programs. Good in technical mentoring, code reviews to deliver quality output. Involved in knowledge sharing and knowledge transfer to the new members of the team & Preparation of knowledge transfer documents. Participated in trainings offered in order to increase technical skills. Good in Oral and written communication skills. Taking ownership of any assigned work. Got consistent & good feedback from every training program
